comments.body: This message might be very long -- I don't know how exactly it's rendered, but I think including the content of the exception (from line 76) might be more useful -- for example that is `'Expecting value: line 3 column 1 (char 3)'`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +77,81 @@                message = self.message or 'JSON Validation Error: {}'.format(ex)
                raise ValidationError(
                    message=field.gettext(message.format(field.data))
                )
